00029 STDMETHODIMP CProbeSetMultiDataExpressionDataCOM::InterfaceSupportsErrorInfo(REFIID riid)
00030 {
00031         static const IID* arr[] = 
00032         {
00033                 &IID_IProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData
00034         };
00035 
00036         for (int i=0; i < sizeof(arr) / sizeof(arr[0]); i++)
00037         {
00038                 if (InlineIsEqualGUID(*arr[i],riid))
00039                         return S_OK;
00040         }
00041         return S_FALSE;
00042 }

00069 STDMETHODIMP CProbeSetMultiDataExpressionDataCOM::GetMetric(int index, VARIANT* pVal)
00070 {
00071     ParameterNameValueType &nv = data.metrics[index];
00072         switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00073         {
00074                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00075                         pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00076             pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueInt8();
00077                         break;
00078 
00079                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00080             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00081                         pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueUInt8();
00082                         break;
00083 
00084                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00085             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00086                         pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueInt16();
00087                         break;
00088 
00089                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00090             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00091                         pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueUInt16();
00092                         break;
00093 
00094                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00095             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00096                         pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueInt32();
00097                         break;
00098 
00099                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00100             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00101                         pVal->lVal = nv.GetValueUInt32();
00102                         break;
00103 
00104                 case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00105             pVal->vt = VT_R4;
00106                         pVal->fltVal = nv.GetValueFloat();
00107                         break;
00108 
00109                 case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00110             pVal->vt = VT_BSTR;
00111                         pVal->bstrVal = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(nv.GetValueAscii());
00112                         break;
00113 
00114                 case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00115             pVal->vt = VT_BSTR;
00116                         pVal->bstrVal = COMStringUtils::ConvertWString(nv.GetValueText());
00117                         break;
00118         }
00119     return S_OK;
00120 }
